item.title: PoS
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Proof of Stake The Proof of Stake consensus algorithm was introduced in 2011 on the Bitcointalk forum to solve the problems of the most popular algorithm in use – Proof of Work.
